name: Frederick William MARKOVITZ, IV, Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Frederick William MARKOVITZ, IV, Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of April, 2013 the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
65 A.3d 900
Frederick William MARKOVITZ, IV, Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary of the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

April 24, 2013.
